Class ItemSelectionListener

java.lang.Object
ItemSelectionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ListSelectionListener
public class ItemSelectionListener extends Object implements ListSelectionListener
Listener that updates the details in the side panel when an item in the table is selected

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemSelectionListener

      public ItemSelectionListener(JTable table, JTextField itemTextField, JTextField priceTextField, JTextField componentTextField, JComboBox<String> availabilityDropdown, JComboBox<String> premiumDropdown, JComboBox<String> seasonalDropdown, JPanel detailsPanel)
      Constructs the actionListener. Will take in input from the GUI and if the data is the correct type, it will add an entry to either the menu_items or components table
      Parameters:
      table - The current table being displayed on the GUI
      itemTextField - The textfield where the item's name will be displayed
      priceTextField - The textfield where the item's price will be displayed
      componentTextField - The textfield where the component's name will be displayed
      availabilityDropdown - The dropdown that shows item/component's availability
      premiumDropdown - The dropdown that shows if a component is premium
      seasonalDropdown - The dropdown that shows if a component is seasonal
      detailsPanel - JPanel that contains all labels that display the item's details
